# PROJECT DESCRIPTION (TRUE SOURCE OF TRUTH)

Happenin is a lightweight movies and live events booking website.
It contains:
- movies list
- live events list
- booking page with UPI scanner
- login page
- feedback form

It is built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

# README REQUIREMENTS

1. Project overview (as above)

   - Movies listing
   - Live events listing
   - UPI-based ticket booking
   - Login page
   - Feedback page
3. Tech Stack:
   - HTML, CSS, JavaScript
4. Folder Structure (based on repo)
5. How to run:
   - Open index.html in browser
